text.headline:
B.S. Mathematical Sciences
@ National Chengchi University NCCU
text.text:
• 2018-2019 Student Research Scholarship, Taiwan Ministry of Science and Technology - Textile Mill Data Analysis
  • Design Award & Best Popularity Award, 2019 FlexSim Production Simulation Competition

text.headline:
High School Math mentor/ teacher
@ Victor +

Full-Time Research Assistant
@ National Chengchi University NCCU
text.text:
Python/ Excel/ R programming
  • Built up discret eevent simulation(DES),highly matched with observed data by t-test,to simulate progress of diabetes for evaluation of healthcare policies in Taiwan.
  • Developed Markov Model by structuring time-dependent transition probability for cohort simulation to calculate risk of common diabetic complications.

text.headline:
M.S. Applied Data Science
@ Syracuse University
text.text:
• GPA: 3.95/4.0
  • TA in Big Data Analytics course
  • Courses: Big Data Analytics, Applied Machine Learning, Applied Deep Learning, Advanced Big Data Mgmt, Algorithms

text.headline:
IT Intern, Data Science
@ NJ Transit
text.text:
Python/ SQL/ Oracle RDBMS/ MSSQL/ SSRS/ Power BI
  • Performed exploratory data analysis and hypothesis testing to explorer idership and pattern under different impacts.
  • Trained time-series regression models to predict bookings and cancellation rate with 93% R-Squared and normalized RMSE less than 6% to help on scheduling; automated model pipeline for daily prediction and model update.
  • Designed database and dashboards to store and visualize data as well as monitored model performance on SSRS.

text.headline:
Data Science Researcher
@ SOS + CD Lab, Syracuse University
text.text:
Python/ PySpark/ YOLOv4/ Docker/ R programming/ HDFS
  • Integrated and containerized PDFFigures2, pdfimages, and Grobid into Docker as a single images extractor for PDFs.
  • Worked on revising ML pipeline of graphical integrity detection using random forest classifier and deep learning models; applied detector to PubMed Central with 0.92 AUC and analyzed future publications with no significant difference.
  • Fine-tuned YOLOv4 to detect legend in graphs with 91.9% mAP and ResNet152 for classification with 0.8 F-1 score; analyzed corresponding captions to estimate explainability of scientific graphs.

text.headline:
Analytics & Insights Professional,
Team Tech Stack @ Amazon Ads
text.text:
Python/ SQL/ Excel/ AWS(SageMaker, CodeCommit, S3, Redshift, Cloud9, QuickSight)/ Tableau/ Streamlit
  • Transformed business questions from stakeholders and advertisers to actionable industry insights of branding media ad products with data science methodologies (machine learning, hypothesis testing, ANOVA, etc.), driving product adoption and revenue.
  • Designed new data pipeline to connect internal database to Amazon Marketing Cloud, scaling up analytic modules and accelerating development; developing application UI for whole org to automate insight development process on AWS Cloud9.
